mng: to rise, to flourish, to become popular, to start, to encourage, to get up, (often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect), maybe (dialect)
feeling or desire to do sth, interest in sth, excitement

exm.mng: prosperity and decline (of a kingdom), rise and fall
interest (desire to know about sth), interest (thing in which one is interested), hobby
happy, glad, willing (to do sth), in a cheerful mood
to begin, to set in motion
Xingguo county in Ganzhou 贛州|赣州, Jiangxi
